channel.name: FHIR Listener
channel.description: NOTE: This channel depends on the following variables being declared in the configuration map: apiUrl: The domain of the API to use when generating resource links. fhirDBDatabaseType: The type of database server (postgres, sqlserver). fhirDBDriver: The JDBC Driver class to use when connecting to the FHIR database. fhirDBUrl: The JDBC connection URL to use when connecting to the FHIR database. fhirDBUsername: The username to use when connecting to the FHIR database. fhirDBPassword: The password to use when connecting to the FHIR database. fhirDBMaxRetries: The maximum amount of retry attempts when a database connection fails.

properties.conformanceTemplate: <CapabilityStatement xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"> <version value="2.2.1"/> <status value="active"/> <publisher value="Yeovil District NHS Foundation Trust"/> <contact> <name value="Frazer Smith"/> <telecom> <system value="email"/> <value value="frazer.smith@ydh.nhs.uk"/> </telecom> </contact> <implementationGuide value="https://nhsconnect.github.io/CareConnectAPI/"/> <rest> <mode value="server"/> <documentation value="Main FHIR endpoint for Yeovil District Hospital NHS Foundation Trust"/> <resource> <type value="AllergyIntolerance"/> <profile> <reference value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-AllergyIntolerance-1"/> </profile> <versioning value="no-version"/> <readHistory value="false"/> <updateCreate value="false"/> <searchParam> <name value="clinical-status"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="active | inactive | resolved"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="date"/> <type value="date"/> <documentation value="Date record was believed accurate"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="patient"/> <type value="reference"/> <documentation value="Who the sensitivity is for"/> </searchParam> </resource> <resource> <type value="Encounter"/> <profile> <reference value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Encounter-1"/> </profile> <versioning value="no-version"/> <readHistory value="false"/> <updateCreate value="false"/> <searchParam> <name value="class"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="inpatient | outpatient | emergency"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="date"/> <type value="date"/> <documentation value="A date within the period the Encounter lasted"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="patient"/> <type value="reference"/> <documentation value="The patient or group present at the encounter"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="type"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="Specific type of encounter using codes defined by DCH Specialty"/> </searchParam> </resource> <resource> <type value="Flag"/> <profile> <reference value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Flag-1"/> </profile> <versioning value="no-version"/> <readHistory value="false"/> <updateCreate value="false"/> <searchParam> <name value="date"/> <type value="date"/> <documentation value="Time period when flag is active"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="patient"/> <type value="reference"/> <documentation value="The identity of a subject to list flags for"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="status"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="active | inactive"/> </searchParam> </resource> <resource> <type value="MedicationStatement"/> <profile> <reference value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-MedicationStatement-1"/> </profile> <versioning value="no-version"/> <readHistory value="false"/> <updateCreate value="false"/> <searchParam> <name value="effective"/> <type value="date"/> <documentation value="Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="patient"/> <type value="reference"/> <documentation value="Returns statements for a specific patient."/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="status"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="active | completed | entered-in-error | intended"/> </searchParam> </resource> <resource> <type value="Patient"/> <profile> <reference value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Patient-1"/> </profile> <versioning value="no-version"/> <readHistory value="false"/> <updateCreate value="false"/> <searchParam> <name value="birthdate"/> <type value="date"/> <documentation value="The patient's date of birth"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="family"/> <type value="string"/> <documentation value="A portion of the family name of the patient"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="gender"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="Gender of the patient"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="given"/> <type value="string"/> <documentation value="A portion of the given name of the patient"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="identifier"/> <type value="token"/> <documentation value="A patient identifier"/> </searchParam> <searchParam> <name value="name"/> <type value="string"/> <documentation value="A portion of the given name or family name of the patient"/> </searchParam> </resource> </rest> <document> <mode value="producer"/> </document> </CapabilityStatement>

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Filter destinations by FHIR interaction

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: FHIR DB Operations
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Functions used by the FHIR Listener channel to communicate with the database. PostgreSQL and SQL Server are supported. If you want to support other database servers, feel free to add your own database-specific operations and queries.

codeTemplate.name: FHIR DB - Execute Cached Query and Get Keys

codeTemplateLibrary.name: FHIR Helper Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description: Other common helper functions used by the FHIR Listener channel.
